repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: This is one of three Nepalese manuscripts of the Samādhirājasūtra, a Mahāyāna Buddhist text, in the collection of the Bibliothèque nationale de France. Notably, this manuscript was used in the 1938 edition of Konstantin Régamey, prior to the discovery of the Gilgit manuscript.
According to the note on the recto of the first folio, this manuscript was given to Eugène Burnouf by Brian Houghton Hodgson in 1841.

msItem.title: Samādhirājasūtra
msItem.incipit: anirādham anutpannam anāvilam anakṣaraṃ | mahāyānam ahaṃ bhāṣye buddhajñānābhivāñchayā ||
msItem.explicit:
idam avocad bhavān āttamanāś candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmāś cānandas tāñ catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāśikāḥ aneke ca śuddhāvāsakā
yikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsūragandharvvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
msItem.finalRubric:
aryasarvvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitāt samādher yathālabdham parivartto nāmaḥ catvāliṃśa
titamaḥ samāpta || 40 ||
msItem.colophon:
ye dharmmā hetuprabhāvāḥ hetus teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ hy avadat teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evamvādi mahāśramaṇaḥ || || śubham astu sarvvajagatāṃm || ꣼ || ||
nepālavarṣa ṛtucandranande māghe ca māse kuhusaṃjñake tithau || śrībhāgyasiṃhaḥ satanūjavargge likhāpayaty eva samādhirājaṃ || ꣼ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Nepālākṣara numerals, in the top-left corner and in the right margin, verso. On the recto of the last folio.

layoutDesc.layout: Double margin lines on the left and right.

additions.desc:
On the recto of the first folio:
Samâdhi Râdja Le roi de la Contemplation
Manuscrit qui m'a été donné par Mr. B. Hodgson.
Mai 1841.

origin.origDate: The colophon gives a Nepālavarṣa date of ṛtucandrananda, or 916.

provenance.p: Given to Eugène Burnouf by Brian Houghton Hodgson.
